import React from 'react'; import { Formik, Field, Form, ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; class PartnerRegister extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } validationSchema() { return Yup.object().shape({ fullname: Yup.string().required('Fullname is required'), username: Yup.string() .required('Username is required') .min(6, 'Username must be at least 6 characters') .max(20, 'Username must not exceed 20 characters'), email: Yup.string() .required('Email is required') .email('Email is invalid'), password: Yup.string() .required('Password is required') .min(6, 'Password must be at least 6 characters') .max(40, 'Password must not exceed 40 characters'), confirmPassword: Yup.string() .required('Confirm Password is required') .oneOf([Yup.ref('password'), null], 'Confirm Password does not match'), acceptTerms: Yup.bool().oneOf([true], 'Accept Terms is required'), }); } handleSubmit(data) { console.log(JSON.stringify(data, null, 0)); } render() { const initialValues = { fullname: '', username: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', acceptTerms: false, }; return (
{({ resetForm }) => (
)}
); } } export default PartnerRegister;
